markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Retractable Claws](/Feats.aspx?ID=2620) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kitsune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=341" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You gain a claw unarmed attack that deals 1d4 slashing damage. Your claws are in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) group and have the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), and [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) traits.
name: Retractable Claws
